Google Dictionary API

As google does not provide any API for google Dictionary.

This Self Project intends to create one.

Getting Started

To use just pass the query string with parameter define equal to the word you want definition of.

Now you can also pass the parameter lang with language code, for definition of words of that language, if you do not specify parameter lang, it defaults to english.

Eg. /?define=hello&lang=en, will give you definition of hello in english as provided by Google in JSON format for your own use.






List of Langauge Codes can be found here

Future plans

You can see existing and add new feature proposals on the projects GitHub page.

Pull requests are welcome!
